```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(plotly)
data <- readRDS("dataOK.rds")
```

# resolution

```{r resolution}
ggplot(data, aes(x = the.release.date, y = the.total.pixels, color = as.factor(the.brand))) + 
  geom_jitter() + 
  theme(plot.subtitle = element_text(vjust = 1),
        plot.caption = element_text(vjust = 1), 
        legend.position = "none") +
  labs(x = "release.date", y = "screen-total pixels") 
```
